More Info

Come and Join Us …

New members always welcome to come along to our regular club nights in Skipton. Have a look at our events timetable, choose a date and pop in to see us at The Soroptimist’s Rooms, 28 Otley St, Skipton, BD23 1EW

Connect with Us …

  • Please feel free to email webeditor@craven-speakers.org.uk us with any queries.
  • We also have a MeetUp site
  • You can also find us on Twitter
  • Or Facebook

Chat with Us …

If you’d prefer to have a chat with somebody before attending a club night, please give one of us a call on 01535 652915 or 01535 665278 or 07941 785340. We’ll be happy to explain more about our club and answer any questions that you may have.
